results.content:
I don't like leaving negative reviews. I know the instructor took plenty of time to put the material together. But that being said, if you don't have a prior understanding of Rails, I think this course will be tough. In some of the lessons the instructor starts with some code, then there's a jump cut, and there is different code without explanation. Then when you go to the github version, the code is different yet again.
Also the final video about the stripe connection, which is what I was mainly waiting for, the source code was not on github which made it a bit difficult to follow. 
Again, I am grateful for the course, but the instructor needs to know that some students might not be too familiar with Rails, therefore better explanations and making sure the final code works is important. Thanks
